sections: In the new episode of our  weekly podcast
It‚Äôs the day after the midterm elections! David Sirota and The Lever‚Äôs entire reporting staff break down all the
, including the big progressive wins, the stunning MAGA losses, the victories for abortion rights, the surprising exit poll data, and the important ballot measures that passed.

In addition, David is joined by Krystal Ball, co-host of Breaking Points, for a big-picture conversation about the election results. David and Krystal discuss shifting electoral trends, what the next two years of Biden‚Äôs presidency might look like, and what it all could mean for the 2024 presidential election.
